title: on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform) order 2024

title: on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27
heading: 2. Fiona O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Fiona O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform, with 
effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 fiona connor particular whose address deposited office department public expenditure national development plan delivery reform appointed special adviser minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform effect 9 april 2024

title: on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27
heading: 3. Deborah Sweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Deborah Sweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform, with 
effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

2 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [350] 3
